attributes.action: request that Coleraine Borough council reinstate Portrush Airshow 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to request that Coleraine Borough Council reinstate the 2010 Portrush airshow. Failure to do so will result in the loss of many millions of lost revenue to the local population.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Coleraine Borough Council in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
